nutritional_support_vitality.title: Multivitamin
nutritional_support_vitality.description: Adequate intake of essential vitamins and minerals is often discussed as part of maintaining overall vitality.

vitamin_d.title: Vitamin D
vitamin_d.description: Vitamin D levels can vary based on factors such as sun exposure, diet, and geographic location.

areas.energy: Vitamin D supports mitochondrial function and cellular energy production by regulating calcium homeostasis.
areas.immuneSupport: Vitamin D modulates both innate and adaptive immune responses, with low levels associated with increased infection susceptibility.
areas.musclePerformance: Vitamin D is critical for muscle strength and function through calcium regulation and muscle protein synthesis pathways.
areas.nervousSystem: Vitamin D influences neurotransmitter production and has neuroprotective effects in the central nervous system.

vitamin_mineral_balance.title: Vitamin and mineral balance
vitamin_mineral_balance.description: Vitamins and minerals play roles in many metabolic and immune-related processes.

mitochondrial_nutrients_coq10.title: Mitochondrial nutrients
mitochondrial_nutrients_coq10.description: Certain nutrients are involved in mitochondrial processes related to cellular energy production.
mitochondrial_nutrients_coq10.analyzePrompt: Analyze the image and determine mitochondrial support needs.

creatine_atp_strength.title: Creatine
creatine_atp_strength.warning: Creatine supplementation may affect kidney function in individuals with pre-existing conditions.

probiotics_microbiota.title: Gut microbiota overview
probiotics_microbiota.warning: Consult with a healthcare provider before starting probiotic supplementation if you have compromised immunity.

hiit_vo2max.title: High-intensity interval training
hiit_vo2max.analyzePrompt: The user has a goal to perform at least 2 high-intensity interval training (HIIT) sessions per week. Based on the workout log, evaluate whether the goal was achieved. Summarize progress and give encouragement or advice.

running_volume_aerobic.title: Progressive volume training
running_volume_aerobic.analyzePrompt: The user is working to increase total running distance each week. Given the workout data, analyze if there's an upward trend. Mention any signs of overtraining or progress plateaus.

multivitamin_general.title: Multivitamin
multivitamin_general.description: Essential vitamins and minerals support overall health and vitality.

coq10_mitochondrial.title: Coenzyme Q10
coq10_mitochondrial.description: CoQ10 supports mitochondrial energy production and cellular health.

nad_plus_energy.title: NAD+
nad_plus_energy.description: NAD+ is involved in cellular metabolism and energy pathways.

vitamin_d_support.title: Vitamin D
vitamin_d_support.description: Vitamin D supports immune function and metabolic health.

magnesium_relaxation.title: Magnesium
magnesium_relaxation.description: Magnesium supports relaxation, sleep quality, and nervous system function.

betaine_cardiovascular.title: Betaine
betaine_cardiovascular.description: Betaine supports cardiovascular function and physical performance.
